item.description: All day silent meditation experience including sitting, walking, yoga and eating. A $25 donation is suggested This event is limited to 12 people. 9 am to 4 pm Sat 1/28/12  Great opportunity to enjoy the tranquility of winter among the hills and fields of Freeport. All level meditators welcomed. There will be a structure to the day with emphasis on personalizing your experience. The longest we will sit in meditation will be about an 45 min.
item.how_to_find_us: Exit 22 off Route 295 take 125/136 West about 1/2 mile turn left on Beach Hill Road - 1.3 miles turn left after red horse barn on Bishop Farm Road (no street sign - it is the next left after Tenpenny Rd and across from Roos Hill Rd)
item.name: Day of Silent Meditation
